title: CT: Northwest Connecticut struggles to gain broadband access
text:
05 CT: Northwest Connecticut struggles to gain broadband access 
San Francisco Chronicle: HARTFORD, Conn. (AP) â€” Connecticut's Litchfield hills, which boast premier antique shops, vineyards and 18th century inns, also feature cellphone dead zones and super-slow Internet service that infuriate residents and frustrate businesses.
